title: Screen View MCP
description: Using Anthropic's MCP SDK to enable AI assistants to capture and analyze screenshots using Claude Vision API.
longDescription:
# Screen View MCP

This project implements a **Multi-Capability Platform (MCP)** integration that enables AI assistants to capture and analyze screenshots.

## Features

- Real-time screenshot capture
- Integration with Claude Vision API for image analysis
- Support for multiple screen resolutions
- Cross-platform compatibility

## Implementation Details

The project was built using:

* TypeScript for type safety
* Node.js for the backend
* The Anthropic MCP SDK
* Claude Vision API for image processing

> This tool significantly enhances the capabilities of AI assistants, allowing them to directly observe and interact with what's on the user's screen.

title: Latent
description: Research project exploring latent space cross-attention mechanisms in transformers.
longDescription:
# Latent Space Research

This project is an **in-depth exploration** of latent space representations and cross-attention in transformer models.

## Research Methods

1. Implemented custom PyTorch modules
2. Experimented with multiple datasets:
   - ImageNet
   - COCO
   - Custom synthetic data

## Key Findings

| Model | Accuracy | Training Time |
|-------|----------|---------------|
| Base  | 87.2%    | 24 hours      |
| Enhanced | 92.5% | 36 hours     |
| Optimized | 94.1% | 30 hours    |

```python
class LatentAttention(nn.Module):
    def __init__(self, dim, heads=8):
        super().__init__()
        self.heads = heads
        self.scale = dim ** -0.5
        self.to_qkv = nn.Linear(dim, dim * 3, bias=False)
        self.to_out = nn.Linear(dim, dim)
```

The research demonstrated that cross-attention mechanisms can significantly improve performance on complex vision tasks.

title: ConverseGPT
description: GPT-based chat app and infrastructure-as-code backend.
longDescription:
# ConverseGPT

A full-stack application featuring a React frontend and a Python backend powered by GPT models.

## Architecture

- **Frontend**: React with TypeScript
- **Backend**: Python FastAPI
- **Infrastructure**: AWS CDK (Infrastructure as Code)
- **Database**: DynamoDB for conversation history
- **Authentication**: Amazon Cognito

## Key Features

* Real-time chat with GPT models
* Conversation history and context management
* Multiple personality modes for different use cases
* API throttling and cost management
* Fully automated CI/CD pipeline

> "ConverseGPT offers enterprise-grade stability with consumer-friendly usability" - *Tech Review Weekly*

The application was designed for scalability and reproducibility, with all infrastructure defined using AWS CDK.
